components.description:
A person tipping their hand by their shoulder as if they’re carrying a tray of drinks or flipping their hair. Originally called Information Desk Person.

This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm.

While no gender is specified, many early designs displayed this emoji as a woman. Google’s 2014 design shows a blob wearing white gloves and a pillbox hat. Microsoft’s 2015 design shows a woman doing this gesture while winking, a facial expression that further reinforces the sassy and sarcastic uses of this emoji.
components.title: Information Desk Person

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a diagonal arrow pointing out the top-right, used as a representation for men.
components.title: Male Sign

description:
A man tipping his hand by his shoulder as if he’s carrying a tray of drinks or flipping his hair.

This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm.
title: Man Tipping Hand

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: The man tipping hand emoji on Apple devices presents a dapper gentleman with a single hand elegantly tilted, conveying a sense of suave charm and polite acknowledgment.  Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give the hand a polished, almost liquid appearance, with subtle highlights that enhance its tactile quality.  This emoji is often used to express a stylish 'thank you,' a gentle greeting, or a subtle wave, embodying sophisticated grace in digital interactions on Apple devices.
